body:
Alright, so there is only 2 people aware of this and they are Stimulating and Tazz. I've contacted Tazz about it and currently waiting for a response on what he thinks.

The Name Of This Unofficial Tournament Is Called "Continents At War". This tournament will work similar to Tazz's Staff vs Regulars. But how the teams will be made up are different. Teams will be made or based on which continent you live in.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Teams/Team Names:

-North America (1)

-North America (2)

-Europe (1)

-Europe (2)

-Asia (1)

-Asia (2)

-Australia (Including New Zealand) (1)

-South America (1)

Team Info:

-Leaders will be picked by myself or Tazz for each team.
-Maximum of 15 Players Minimum of 10 Players.
-Members must live in the same Continent as you.

Current Leaders:

-Dawson (North America 1)
-
-Raging (Europe 1)
-
-
-
-
-

Time/Date:

N/A (This will take multiple days so me and maybe Tazz will make the best times possible)

Prizes:

N/A (Not Announced)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feel Free to leave feedback and I will answer any questions you may have. :D

My bad, people count the continents according to their different cultures, that's why some of you think America is divided into 2 and some others (Like me) think of it as 1 whole.

Note I found out about this on Wikipedia.

replies.body:
This Is Official Happening.

Dates will be happening on February 19th and 20th Each day it will start at 1pm EST and end around 7pm EST.

Current Team Leaders;

-North America (1), Dawson

-North America (2).

-Europe (1), Raging/Razeh

-Europe (2),

-Asia (1)

-Australia (1)

-South America (1)

-South America (2)

If you wish to be a leader myself or BmB will offer you it. If you get selected to be a leader then you may only pick players that are from your Continent. Like I said before if you're not listed in one of them above you may join the one that is the closest to you. I'm hoping this will be a great turn out and Good Luck to everyone that plays :D
